bonusAction.name: Cunning Action
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action on your turn.

bonusAction.name: Fury of Blows
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can make two unarmed strikes after taking the Attack action.

bonusAction.name: Second Wind
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level once per short or long rest.

bonusAction.name: Divine Smite
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can expend spell slots to deal extra radiant damage on a successful melee attack.

bonusAction.name: Wild Shape
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can transform into a beast form that you have seen before.

bonusAction.name: Rage
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can enter a state of rage, gaining advantages on Strength checks and saving throws, and dealing extra damage with melee weapons.

bonusAction.name: Hexblade's Curse
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can curse a target, gaining bonus damage against them and regaining hit points when they die.

bonusAction.name: Flurry of Blows
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can make two unarmed strikes after taking the Attack action.

bonusAction.name: Misty Step
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

bonusAction.name: Sneak Attack
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can deal extra damage to a creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll.

bonusAction.name: Ki Points
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can spend ki points to activate various abilities such as Patient Defense or Step of the Wind.

bonusAction.name: Action Surge
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can take an additional action on your turn, once per short or long rest.

bonusAction.name: Lay on Hands
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can restore a number of hit points to yourself or an ally, up to your paladin level times 5.

bonusAction.name: Shillelagh
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can imbue a club or quarterstaff with magical power, using your spellcasting ability for attack and damage rolls.

bonusAction.name: Evasion
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can dodge out of the way of certain area effects, such as a red dragon's fiery breath or an ice storm spell.

bonusAction.name: Reckless Attack
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can throw aside all concern for defense to attack with fierce desperation. Gain advantage on melee weapon attack rolls, but attacks against you have advantage until your next turn.

bonusAction.name: Mystic Arcanum
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can cast a higher-level spell that you have gained through your Pact Boon feature.

bonusAction.name: Patient Defense
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can take the Dodge action until the start of your next turn.

bonusAction.name: Fighting Style
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can adopt a particular fighting style, such as Defense, Dueling, or Great Weapon Fighting, gaining special benefits related to that style.

bonusAction.name: Hex
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can curse a creature, dealing extra damage when you hit it with an attack.

bonusAction.name: Thunderous Smite
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can imbue your weapon with thunderous energy, dealing extra damage and pushing the target away on a successful hit.

bonusAction.name: Wild Surge
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can roll on the Wild Magic Surge table after casting a sorcerer spell of 1st level or higher.

bonusAction.name: Invoke Duplicity
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can create an illusory duplicate of yourself to distract enemies and cast spells from a different location.

bonusAction.name: Rage
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can enter a state of rage, gaining advantages on Strength checks and saving throws, and dealing extra damage with melee weapons.

bonusAction.name: Bardic Inspiration
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can inspire others through stirring words or music, granting them an inspiration die to add to ability checks, attack rolls, or saving throws.

bonusAction.name: Stunning Strike
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can spend ki points to attempt to stun a creature you hit with a melee weapon attack.

bonusAction.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can use your Channel Divinity to force undead creatures within 30 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw or be turned.

bonusAction.name: Spiritual Weapon
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can create a floating, spectral weapon that attacks on your behalf as a spell.

bonusAction.name: Shadow Blade
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can create a sword of shadow that deals psychic damage and has finesse, light, and thrown properties.

bonusAction.name: Commanding Strike
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can forgo one of your attacks to allow an ally to make an attack with their reaction and add your superiority die to the damage.

bonusAction.name: Arcane Recovery
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can recover expended spell slots during a short rest, up to a combined level of half your wizard level.

bonusAction.name: Misty Step
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

bonusAction.name: Expeditious Retreat
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can cast Expeditious Retreat, allowing you to dash as a bonus action for the duration.

bonusAction.name: Shadow Blade
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can create a sword of shadow that deals psychic damage and has finesse, light, and thrown properties.

bonusAction.name: Teleportation Circle
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can use this spell to teleport yourself and others to a permanent teleportation circle.

bonusAction.name: Divine Favor
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can call on your deity to empower your attacks, granting you bonus damage on weapon attacks.

bonusAction.name: Step of the Wind
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can spend ki points to take the Disengage or Dash action, and your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

bonusAction.name: Blessing of the Trickster
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can grant advantage on Stealth checks to an ally within 30 feet.

bonusAction.name: Martial Arts
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can make an unarmed strike or use a monk weapon after taking the Attack action.

bonusAction.name: Enrage
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can enter a state of rage, gaining advantages on Strength checks and saving throws, and dealing extra damage with melee weapons.

bonusAction.name: Eldritch Blade
bonusAction.description: You evoke a arcane blade in your free hand. The blade is similar in size and shape to a katana, and it lasts for the duration.

bonusAction.name: Step of the Wind
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can spend ki points to take the Disengage or Dash action, and your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

bonusAction.name: Rally
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can inspire an ally, granting them temporary hit points.

bonusAction.name: Arcane Ward
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can create an arcane ward that absorbs damage, protecting you from harm.

bonusAction.name: Bladesong
bonusAction.description: As a bonus action, you can enter a state of bladesong, gaining benefits to your AC, concentration saves, and movement speed.

cantrips.name: Fire Bolt
cantrips.description: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range...

cantrips.name: Eldritch Blast
cantrips.description: A beam of crackling energy streaks toward a creature within range...

cantrips.name: Mage Hand
cantrips.description: A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range...

cantrips.name: Prestidigitation
cantrips.description: This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice...

cantrips.name: Ray of Frost
cantrips.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range...

cantrips.name: Mending
cantrips.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch...

cantrips.name: Light
cantrips.description: You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension...

cantrips.name: Minor Illusion
cantrips.description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration...

cantrips.name: Thaumaturgy
cantrips.description: You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range...

cantrips.name: Vicious Mockery
cantrips.description: You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range...

cantrips.name: Chill Touch
cantrips.description: You create a ghostly, skeletal hand in the space of a creature within range...

cantrips.name: Guidance
cantrips.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice...

cantrips.name: Resistance
cantrips.description: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice...

cantrips.name: Shocking Grasp
cantrips.description: Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch...

cantrips.name: Sacred Flame
cantrips.description: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage...

cantrips.name: True Strike
cantrips.description: You extend your hand and point a finger at a target in range. Your magic grants you a brief insight into the target's defenses...

cantrips.name: Dancing Lights
cantrips.description: You create up to four torch-sized lights within range, making them appear as torches, lanterns, or glowing orbs that hover in the air...

cantrips.name: Message
cantrips.description: You point your finger toward a creature within range and whisper a message. The target (and only the target) hears the message and can reply in a whisper that only you can hear...

cantrips.name: Mage Armor
cantrips.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends...

cantrips.name: Spare the Dying
cantrips.description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable...

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: A bright streak... (spell description)
spells.higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher...

spells.name: Healing Word
spells.description: A creature of your choice... (spell description)
spells.higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher...

spells.name: Shield
spells.description: An invisible barrier of magical force... (spell description)

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description: A creature you touch regains a number of hit points... (spell description)
spells.higherLevels: This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.description: You touch a willing creature who isn’t wearing armor... (spell description)

spells.name: Bless
spells.description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice... (spell description)

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: You create three glowing darts of magical force... (spell description)
spells.higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher...

spells.name: Thorn Whip
spells.description: You create a long, vine-like whip covered in thorns... (spell description)

spells.name: Charm Person
spells.description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range... (spell description)

spells.name: Mending
spells.description: This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch... (spell description)

spells.name: Darkness
spells.description: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range... (spell description)

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends... (spell description)
spells.higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher...

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration...
spells.higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher...

spells.name: Fly
spells.description: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet...
spells.higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher...

spells.name: Suggestion
spells.description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature...

spells.name: Revivify
spells.description: You touch a creature that has died within the last minute...

spells.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
spells.description: A black beam of enervating energy springs from your finger toward a creature within range...
spells.higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher...

spells.name: Polymorph
spells.description: This spell transforms a creature that you can see within range into a new form...

spells.name: Counterspell
spells.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell...

spells.name: Spirit Guardians
spells.description: You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet...
spells.higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher...

weapons.name: Longsword
weapons.description: A versatile and well-balanced melee weapon.

weapons.name: Shortbow
weapons.description: A small and lightweight bow suitable for short-range attacks.

weapons.name: Warhammer
weapons.description: A sturdy hammer designed for crushing blows.

weapons.name: Crossbow, Heavy
weapons.description: A large and powerful crossbow that requires time to reload between shots.

weapons.name: Dagger
weapons.description: A small, easily concealable blade suitable for close-quarters combat.

weapons.name: Greataxe
weapons.description: A massive double-bladed axe, effective but requiring strength to wield.

weapons.name: Shortsword
weapons.description: A lightweight and versatile blade, well-suited for finesse fighters.

weapons.name: Longbow
weapons.description: A powerful bow with great range, best used by those with strength and skill.

weapons.name: Rapier
weapons.description: A slender and pointed blade, perfect for precise strikes.

weapons.name: Mace
weapons.description: A simple yet effective bludgeoning weapon.

weapons.name: Spear
weapons.description: A versatile weapon that can be used for thrusting or throwing.

weapons.name: Handaxe
weapons.description: A small, versatile axe that can be used in hand-to-hand combat or thrown.

weapons.name: Flail
weapons.description: A weapon with a spiked ball attached to a chain, providing a flexible and unpredictable attack.

weapons.name: Scimitar
weapons.description: A curved sword with a sharp blade, suitable for agile combatants.

weapons.name: Javelin
weapons.description: A lightweight spear designed for throwing at enemies.

weapons.name: Greatsword
weapons.description: A large, two-handed sword with a powerful slashing capability.

weapons.name: Net
weapons.description: A mesh of woven ropes designed to entangle and restrain creatures.

weapons.name: Halberd
weapons.description: A polearm with an axe blade and a spear point, providing both slashing and thrusting attacks.

weapons.name: Dart
weapons.description: A small, throwable projectile with a sharp point.

weapons.name: Quarterstaff
weapons.description: A simple staff that can be used with one or two hands for both offense and defense.
